On the day MN nursing home "battle plan" was announced May 7th, 407 of 508 COVID-19 deaths (80%) were in long-term care. In three weeks since then, 380 of 459 deaths were in LTC (83%). MN now has more Covid-19 deaths in LTC (787) than Wisconsin has total COVID-19 deaths (545).
